title: Parent Actions, Dualities and New Weyl-invariant Actions of Bosonic p-branes
abstract: By using the systematic approach of parent action method, we derive the Polyakov and two Weyl-invariant actions of bosonic p-branes ($p \geq 2$) starting from the Nambu-Goto action, and establish the duality symmetries in this set of four actions. Moreover, we discover a new bosonic p-brane action (including the string theory) and deduce two corresponding Weyl-invariant formulations by proposing a new special parent action. We find that the same duality symmetries as those mentioned above exist in this new set of actions. The new p-brane actions are also briefly analyzed.
